mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_PRICE, IMG_ROOT, P_CATEGORY_NM, PRODUCT_ST, P_CD, P_CATEGORY_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE R.P_CD=P.P_CD) STAR_COUNT, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE R.P_CD=P.P_CD) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((SELECT SUM(STAR_RATING) FROM REVIEW ) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW )) END AS STAR_AVG FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON(P.P_CD = R.P_CD) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON(P.P_CD = I.P_CD) JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(P_CATEGORY_NO)

SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_PRICE, IMG_ROOT, P_CATEGORY_NM, PRODUCT_ST, P_CD, P_CATEGORY_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE R.P_CD=P.P_CD) STAR_COUNT, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE R.P_CD=P.P_CD) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((SELECT SUM(STAR_RATING) FROM REVIEW ) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW )) END AS STAR_AVG FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON(P.P_CD = R.P_CD) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON(P.P_CD = I.P_CD) JOIN P_CATEGORY USING(P_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE P_CATEGORY_NO = #{selectCategoryNo}
